entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:59 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 3:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
